Scorponok stammerd, it had been so long since he had seen Megatron, or so
he thought, and he had never taken such and angered tone with him. "Uh,
Megatron, someone wants to talk to you bad, and I just want to serve you
like before" he stammered clicking his claws together nervously, "whats the
matter, arent you happy to see me?" he trailed off.
